description: The Government of Canada (GC) is seeking to increase its documents storage and management capacity...
full_summary:
**Document Storage and Management Tender Announcement**
=====================================

### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: WS4438146811-Doc4438204535
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4438146811
* **Publication Date**: February 9, 2024
* **Closing Date**: March 25, 2024 at 2:00 PM (ET)

### Tender Description

The Government of Canada is seeking the services of private sector contractors to provide document storage, information retrieval, and document destruction services to government departments, agencies, and Crown corporations across Canada.

### Requirements

The successful contractor will be required to provide the following services:

* Document storage and management
* Information retrieval and documentation
* Document destruction and disposal services

### Location

The services will be required by various government departments, agencies, and Crown corporations across Canada.

### Eligibility

Only private sector contractors are eligible to submit a bid for this tender.

### Language

Both official languages, English and French, are accepted.

### Trade Agreements

The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this tender.

### Contract Details

* **Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2024
* **Contract End Date**: March 31, 2026

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Anita Laure Segla (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: anitalaure.segla@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18761295?extsite=MTg3NjEyOTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Attachment

No attachments are available for this tender announcement.
